name: OpenAlpha_Evolve (shyamsaktawat)
description: [项目级] OpenAlpha_Evolve is an open-source Python framework inspired by the groundbreaking research on autonomous coding agents like DeepMind's AlphaEvolve.。来源: https://github.com/shyamsaktawat/OpenAlpha_Evolve

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
OpenAlpha_Evolve is an open-source Python framework inspired by the groundbreaking research on autonomous coding agents like DeepMind's AlphaEvolve.

来源: https://github.com/shyamsaktawat/OpenAlpha_Evolve
语言: Python
Stars: 970

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
git clone https://github.com/shyamsaktawat/OpenAlpha_Evolve.git
    cd OpenAlpha_Evolve

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE.md
README.md
app.py
code_generator
code_generator/__init__.py
code_generator/agent.py
config
config/__init__.py
config/settings.py
core
core/__init__.py
core/interfaces.py
database_agent
database_agent/__init__.py
database_agent/agent.py
evaluator_agent
evaluator_agent/Dockerfile
evaluator_agent/__init__.py
evaluator_agent/agent.py
examples

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
*   **LLM-Powered Code Generation**: Leverages state-of-the-art Large Language Models via LiteLLM, supporting multiple providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.).
*   **Evolutionary Algorithm Core**: Implements iterative improvement through selection, LLM-driven mutation/bug-fixing using diffs, and survival.
*   **Modular Agent Architecture**: Easily extend or replace individual components (e.g., use a different LLM, database, or evaluation strategy).
*   **Automated Program Evaluation**: Syntax checking and functional testing against user-provided examples. Code execution is sandboxed using
